channel.title: Freezing Mopar?
channel.description:
Basically, my MoparScape freezes VERY often, more often than all others i know. Quite literally it can be 5 times in a row before i actually log in.
I get about 10 lines of shit on my runbot every time it happens.
Anyone know why? :\

item.title: Freezing Mopar?
item.dc:creator: @jakenem12 jakenem12
item.description:
@jakenem12 wrote:

same thing happens to me in the lated virsion of mopar

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing Mopar?
item.dc:creator: @Startin Startin
item.description:
@Startin wrote:

Think I could get an answer?.. Considering i made the thread and so far ive had people who know nothing or answers to someone who jacks my post :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing Mopar?
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

uber killer:

Either a firewall or your router is not letting moparscape through, Disable your firewall and open all your ports, and see what happens.

Ok, I’ll go try that, although I don’t think that I have a firewall (if I do I dont know how to disable it), and I have no idea how to “open my ports”.

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing Mopar?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Either a firewall or your router is not letting moparscape through, Disable your firewall and open all your ports, and see what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Freezing Mopar?
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

[quote=“Startin, post:3, topic:6067”]How many ways are there to extract something? If it loads then its extracted correctly.

I literally can’t get on now, i get to the loading screen just after logging in and it freezes there without fail…
Btw im using MS 3.0w/Aryan.[/quote]

The exact same thing happens to me, heres what I get:

[05:02:54] Server : 127.0.0.1
[05:07:09] Server: Starting HybridScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
[05:07:37]
[05:07:37] Logging into (dear summer, *****)
[05:07:38] Your UID is: 11260326
[05:08:11] Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4299
[05:09:24]
[05:09:25] Logging into (dear summer, *****)
[05:09:25] Your UID is: 11260326
[05:09:41] Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4300
[05:09:44] Did not save for dear_summer
[05:09:45] Server: ClientHandler: Client dear_summer disconnected.
[05:10:15]
[05:10:15] Logging into (dearsummer, *****)
[05:10:17] Your UID is: 48251743
[05:10:19] Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4301
[05:10:20] Registering user dearsummer with pass *****
[05:10:22] Registration succesful!!
[05:10:34] Server: Client lost connection: timeout
[05:10:34] Game saved for player dearsummer
[05:10:36] Server: ClientHandler: Client dearsummer disconnected.
[05:10:49]
[05:10:49] Logging into (dearsummer, *****)
[05:10:49] Your UID is: 48251743
[05:10:53] Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4302
[05:14:35] Server: Client lost connection: timeout
[05:14:45] Game saved for player dearsummer
[05:14:47] Server: ClientHandler: Client dearsummer disconnected.

Can anybody tell me why?

Read full topic
